Class SimpleReenforcementLearning

java.lang.Object
  hume.SimpleReenforcementLearning
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILearning
public class SimpleReenforcementLearning
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILearning

Implements a very simple reenforcement learning algorithm.

STATUS: not tested

Author:
eckhart

Constructor Summary
SimpleReenforcementLearning()
           
 
Method Summary
 void learnExploitAsCustomer(Agent agent, Agent other, TrustGame game)
          Draws conclusions (i.e. adjusts its variables) for the agent agent, if it was exploited in the role of the customer by the agent other.
 void learnExploitAsSupplier(Agent agent, Agent other, TrustGame game)
          Draws conclusions (i.e. adjusts its variables) for the agent agent, if it exploited in the role of the supplier by the agent other.
 void learnRewardAsCustomer(Agent agent, Agent other, TrustGame game)
          Draws conclusions (i.e. adjusts its variables) for the agent agent, if it was rewarded in the role of the customer by the agent other.
 void learnRewardAsSupplier(Agent agent, Agent other, TrustGame game)
          Draws conclusions (i.e. adjusts its variables) for the agent agent, if it rewarded in the role of the supplier by the agent other.
 void learnStayedAtHome(Agent agent, TrustGame trustGame)
          Draws conclusions (i.e. adjusts its variables) for the agent agent, if it decided to stay at home.

                                   TrustGame game)
Description copied from interface: ILearning
Draws conclusions (i.e. adjusts its variables) for the agent agent, if it was exploited in the role of the customer by the agent other.

Specified by:
learnExploitAsCustomer in interface ILearning
Parameters:
agent - the agent for which learning takes place
other - the supplier that exploited the agent
game - the trust game that the agents played

public void learnStayedAtHome(Agent agent,
                              TrustGame trustGame)
Description copied from interface: ILearning
Draws conclusions (i.e. adjusts its variables) for the agent agent, if it decided to stay at home.

Specified by:
learnStayedAtHome in interface ILearning
Parameters:
agent - the agent that (potentially) learns something
